title: The Complete Inspector Morse Crime Collection
description:
Audio Books : Mystery and Suspense : Other quality : English

Most are recorded from cassette tapes except books #12 and #13 which are from CD.
All are recorded at 32 kbps / 22 kHz Mono, Fraunhofer CBR MP3.
Narrators include Terrence Hardiman, Michael Pennington, Colin Dexter and Patrick Tull.



I posted this collection here in 2010. I have since had many requests to seed, so here is the complete collection of 13 novels once again.

Many of these audio titles are hard to find now. I recorded these from cassette tapes back in 2005, but even now in 2015 I can still only find unabridged CD versions of the last two books!

#1. Last Bus To Woodstock [8 hours] 1975 Read by Terrence Hardiman


#2. Last Seen Wearing [7 hours 48 mins] 1976 Read by Michael Pennington


#3. The Silent World of Nicholas Quinn [7 hours 11 mins] 1977 Read by Terrence Hardiman


#4. Service of All the Dead [8 hours 10 mins] 1979 Read by Terrence Hardiman


#5. The Dead of Jericho [7 hours 50 mins] 1981 Read by Colin Dexter


#6. The Riddle of the Third Mile [5 hours 40 mins] 1983 Read by Michael Pennington (Thanks to EMP)


#7. The Secret of Annexe 3 [6 hours 42 mins] 1986 Read by Michael Pennington


#8. The Wench Is Dead [6 hours 56 mins] 1989 Read by Colin Dexter


#9. The Jewel That Was Ours [7 hours 8 mins] 1989 Read by Michael Pennington


#10. The Way Through the Woods [8 hours 24 mins] 1992 Read by Michael Pennington


#11. The Daughters of Cain [9 hours 53 mins] 1994 Read by Terrence Hardiman


#12. Death Is Now My Neighbour [8 hours 53 mins] 1996 Read by Terrence Hardiman. CD


#13. The Remorseful Day [10 hours 54 mins] 1999 Read by Terrence Hardiman. CD
iginal murder? Lewis continues to probe while Morse remains his oracular self.

Morse's Greatest Mystery: And Other Stories [7 hours 56 mins] Read by Patrick Tull (Thanks to EMP)



Enjoy and Seed!!
